description: enrichment schema generate by tagSchemaToJson from enrichment

markers.description: Space-delimited list of markers (with +/-) used for enrichment. e.g. CD4+ CD8-

size_max.description: Maximum size passing selection, in microns.

size_min.description: Minimum size passing selection, in microns.

type.description: The method by which enrichment was achieved. e.g. MACS, FACS, Ficoli gradient

title: enrichment
